name: Kill All Aliens
description:
In the year 2025, you are hunting for deer to feed your family. 2 hours have passed by and you're ready to go home.

suddenly a mysterious aircraft hovers above you.

It Abducts you!

the next minute you see the interior of the spacecraft. you find out its operated by extraterrestrials and they want to eat you!

you reload your gun and are ready to shoot some aliens.
